title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - City Update IX now available
description:
In this video we will explore City Update IX. This update focuses on North-Eastern US and specifically on: Washington, DC region; Buffalo, New York; Allentown, Pennsylvania area; and the East End of Long Island, New York.

The update is updating the aerial imagery, new digital elevation models, and TIN (triangulated irregular network) surface texturing for this area.

If you fly there tonight you can enjoy the nice fireworks to celebrate the 4th of July.

p.s. watch the video if you are not sure how the install it because there is one additional step required.
